text: Background : A growing diversity of biological data is tagged with unique identifiers ( UIDs ) associated with polynucleotides and proteins to ensure efficient computer - mediated data storage , maintenance , and processing . These identifiers , which are not informative for most people , are often substituted by biologically meaningful names in various presentations to facilitate utilization and dissemination of sequence - based knowledge . This substitution is commonly done manually that may be a tedious exercise prone to mistakes and omissions .
